title: Tools for Analyzing Similarity Between Blades
text: basic example shows solve common problem: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . can also embed plots, example: case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
code: library(blade) ## basic example code summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00

what: Top k clustered local maximums — df_topk
title: Top k clustered local maximums — df_topk
text: function uses density-based spatial clustering applications noise (DBSCAN) get top k clustered local maximum alignment data frame.

title: Top k clustered local maximums — df_topk
Top k clustered local maximums — df_topk
text: data alignment data frame two columns: lag ccf. k positive integer control number resulting local maximums. probs value 0 1 control data used clustering. len_block positive number controlling size neighborhood.

title: Top k clustered local maximums — df_topk
text: data frame three columns: .cluster: cluster id. lag: lag alignment. ccf: cross-correlation value alignment.

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: lhs value magrittr placeholder. rhs function call using magrittr semantics.

what: Subsampled dataset of wire and blade cuts — x3p_subsamples
title: Subsampled dataset of wire and blade cuts — x3p_subsamples
text: dataset subsampled version original x3p wire blade cuts data. subsampling performed factor 10.

title: Subsampled dataset of wire and blade cuts — x3p_subsamples
Subsampled dataset of wire and blade cuts — x3p_subsamples
text: list x3p objects, representing surface scan. list includes: T1AW-LO-R1: x3p object representing first surface scan. T1AS-R1: x3p object representing second surface scan.
